long_description: Lightweight and ready for demanding adventures, the Keen Turia Sandals offer great support and stability for warm-weather outings around town and to the beach. Water-friendly and lightweight synthetic leather and polyester webbing uppers wrap feet and wash up easily; airy nylon mesh dries quickly and helps keep debris out. Uppers are laced with elastic cord and secure with cordlocks for a comfortable, easily adjustable fit; heel straps cinch with laces to lock heels down. Patented rubber toe guards protect feet from scuffs, bumps and uneven terrain. Nylon mesh linings wick moisture away from feet and dry quickly to enhance comfort. Molded EVA foodbeds are treated with AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment to help deter odors. Compression-molded dual-density EVA midsoles offer shock absorption and padding for all-day comfort; supportive ESS shanks provide torsional stability. S3 (shock, suspension, stability) heel support structure supports the feet on impact, dissipates shock and helps reduce the chance of twisting an ankle. Keen Turia Sandals use a rubber compound that's specifically designed for wet environs and features razor siping for enhanced traction on slippery surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Lightweight and ready for demanding adventures, the Keen Turia Sandals offer great support and stability for warm-weather outings around town and to the beach.
